item.title: Etihad improves chauffeur services in the United Arab Emirates
item.description:
Etihad Airways, the national airline of the UAE, has launched new features to improve its chauffeur services in the UAE. Passengers can now book and manage Etihad’s chauffeur services directly through the airline’s updated mobile-friendly website, eliminating the need to contact the Etihad call center or a travel agent. This feature is effective immediately. Travelers can book and confirm their chauffeur service up to 12 hours before their flight’s departure. Developed with Vxceed Technologies, the new system also allows passengers to modify or cancel their chauffeur booking, giving them more control over their travel plans...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-improves-chauffeur-services-in-the-united-arab-emirates/
